00023 simsignal_t Buffer::txPkSignal = SIMSIGNAL_NULL;
00024 simsignal_t Buffer::latencySignal = SIMSIGNAL_NULL;
00025 
00026 void Buffer::initialize()
00027 {
00028     ev << "Initialize Buffer" << endl;
00029     initializeStatistics();
00030 }
00031 
00032 void Buffer::initializeStatistics()
00033 {
00034     txPkSignal = registerSignal("txPk");
00035     latencySignal = registerSignal("latency");
00036 }
00037 
00038 void Buffer::recordPacketSent()
00039 {
00040     emit(txPkSignal, 1L);
00041 }
00042 
00043 void Buffer::setIsEmpty(bool empty)
00044 {
00045     if (empty)
00046     {
00047         getDisplayString().setTagArg("i", 1, "black");
00048     }
00049     else
00050     {
00051         getDisplayString().setTagArg("i", 1, "");
00052     }
00053 }

00056 {
00057     destinationGates.push_back(destinationGate);

00061 {

00065 void Buffer::addReceiveCallback(Callback *cb, TTEApplicationBase *application)
00066 {
00067     receiveCallbacks[application]=cb;
00068 }
00069 
00070 Callback* Buffer::getReceiveCallback(TTEApplicationBase *application)
00071 {
00072     if(receiveCallbacks.find(application) == receiveCallbacks.end())
00073         return NULL;
00074     return receiveCallbacks[application];
00075 }
00076 
00077 void Buffer::addTransmitCallback(Callback *cb, TTEApplicationBase *application)
00078 {
00079     transmitCallbacks[application]=cb;
00080 }
00081 
00082 Callback* Buffer::getTransmitCallback(TTEApplicationBase *application)
00083 {
00084     if(transmitCallbacks.find(application) == transmitCallbacks.end())
00085         return NULL;
00086     return transmitCallbacks[application];
00087 }
00088 
00089 EtherFrame* Buffer::getFrame(){
00090     return dequeue();
00091 }
00092 
00093 void Buffer::handleMessage(cMessage *msg)
00094 {
00095     if (msg->arrivedOn("in"))
00096     {
00097         EtherFrame *frame = check_and_cast<EtherFrame *>(msg);
00098         //Try to correct destination mac
00099         if(frame->getDest().isUnspecified()){
00100             MACAddress mac;
00101             unsigned long ct_mask = par("ct_mask").longValue();
00102             unsigned long ct_marker = par("ct_marker").longValue();
00103             unsigned long ct_id = par("ct_id").longValue();
00104             ct_marker &= ct_mask;
00105             mac.setAddressByte(0, ct_marker>>24);
00106             mac.setAddressByte(1, ct_marker>>16);
00107             mac.setAddressByte(2, ct_marker>>8);
00108             mac.setAddressByte(3, ct_marker);
00109             mac.setAddressByte(4, ct_id>>8);
00110             mac.setAddressByte(5, ct_id);
00111             frame->setDest(mac);
00112         }
00113         emit(latencySignal, simTime()-msg->getCreationTime());
00114         enqueue((EtherFrame*) frame);
00115         // Now execute callbacks if there are some
00116         for(std::map<TTEApplicationBase*,Callback*>::const_iterator iter = receiveCallbacks.begin();
00117                 iter != receiveCallbacks.end(); ++iter){
00118             iter->first->executeCallback(iter->second);
00119         }
00120     }
00121 }
